title: RAPID Score for Acetabular Chondrolabral Disruption
desc: The RAPID Score for Acetabular Chondrolabral Disruption predicts probability of finding high-grade cartilage damage intraoperatively.

orgreference.text: Hevesi M, Hartigan DE, Wu IT, et al. The Rapidly Assessed Predictor of Intraoperative Damage (RAPID) Score: An In-Clinic Predictive Model for High-Grade Acetabular Chondrolabral Disruption. Orthop J Sports Med. 2018;6(10):2325967118799068.
